overview.summary: Provides a description of how FbCommandBuilder will do the generation of the WHERE clausule of UPDATE and DELETE commands

field.name: AllFields
field.summary: The FbCommandBuilder class will do the generation of the WHERE clausule of UPDATE and DELETE commands using all fields.

field.name: KeyFields
field.summary: The FbCommandBuilder class will do the generation of the WHERE clausule of UPDATE and DELETE commands using only the key fields.

field.name: KeyAndTimestampFields
field.summary: The FbCommandBuilder class will do the generation of the WHERE clausule of UPDATE and DELETE commands using only the key fields and the timestamp column specified in TimestampColumnName.
